Uses of Interface
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.RowMapper

Packages that use DatabaseResult.RowMapper
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DatabaseResult.RowMapper in org.fluentjdbc

    Returns an DatabaseResult.Iterator which iterates over all rows in the ResultSet and apply a DatabaseResult.RowMapper to each.

    <T> SingleRow<T>
    DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder.singleObject(Connection connection, DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T> mapper)
    If the query returns no rows, returns SingleRow.absent(java.util.function.Supplier<EX>), if exactly one row is returned, maps it and return it, if more than one is returned, throws `IllegalStateException`

    <T> Optional<T>
    DatabaseRow.table(DatabaseTableAlias alias, DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T> function)
    Extracts a DatabaseRow for the specified DatabaseTableAlias and maps it over the DatabaseResult.RowMapper function to return an object mapped from the part of the DatabaseRow belonging to the specified alias.
